sentences: Arvan, et meelest on see hea mõte.
context: The word 'meelest' is an Estonian adverbial form that means 'in my opinion' or 'I think'. It is derived from the noun 'meel' (mind/opinion) combined with the locative case ending '-st', indicating a position or perspective. This construction is commonly used in spoken and written Estonian to express personal viewpoints.
